name: single-page-christmas-video-site
description: A simple 1-page HTML site that holds 2 videos, 1 for greater-than 2,000px wide (meant to load a 4K video) and one for less than 2,000px wide meant to hold a 1080p video. This is a quick way to deploy a festive christmas video for holiday promotions. Built with Tailwind CSS.
author: Sam
